sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import apiRequest from '../../utils/api'; import { toast } from '../../utils/notification'; import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layouts/DashboardLayout'; import Breadcrumb from '../../components/ui/Breadcrumb'; const BillingDashboard = () => { const [clients, setClients] = useState([]); const [clientBilling, setClientBilling] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { setLoading(true); try { // Fetch clients const clientsData = await apiRequest('/api/clients/'); setClients(clientsData); // Fetch billing summary for clients const billingData = await apiRequest('/api/billing/client-summary/'); setClientBilling(billingData); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching billing data:', error); toast.error('Failed to load billing information'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); }, []); return (

Billing Dashboard

Manage billing and invoices for your clients.

Time Entries
Manage Time Entries
Invoices
Manage Invoices
Create Invoice
New Invoice
{/* Client Billing Summary */}

Client Billing Summary

{loading ? (

Loading billing information...

) : clientBilling.length === 0 ? (

No client billing information available.

) : (
{clientBilling.map((client) => ( ))}
Client Name Unbilled Hours Unbilled Amount Outstanding Invoices Actions
{client.name} {client.unbilled_hours.toFixed(2)} ${client.unbilled_amount.toFixed(2)} ${client.outstanding_invoices.toFixed(2)} Create Invoice View Time
)}
); }; export default BillingDashboard;
